comments.content: Adobe [Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725031827/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/caslon) Bold Italic using swash alternates: / [G](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725031827/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/caslon/bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/511583/342), / [R](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725031827/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/caslon/bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/511583/353), / [W](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725031827/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/caslon/bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/511583/358) and / [N](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725031827/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/caslon/bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/511583/349)
